005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/** NetworkTables Connection notification. */
008@SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
009public final class ConnectionNotification {
010  /**
011   * Handle of listener that was triggered. ConnectionListener.getHandle() or the return value of
012   * ConnectionListenerPoller.add() can be used to map this to a specific added listener.
013   */
014  public final int listener;
015
016  /** True if event is due to connection being established. */
017  public final boolean connected;
018
019  /** Connection information. */
020  public final ConnectionInfo conn;
021
022  /**
023   * Constructor. This should generally only be used internally to NetworkTables.
024   *
025   * @param inst Instance
026   * @param listener Listener that was triggered
027   * @param connected Connected if true
028   * @param conn Connection information
029   */
030  public ConnectionNotification(
031      NetworkTableInstance inst, int listener, boolean connected, ConnectionInfo conn) {
032    this.m_inst = inst;
033    this.listener = listener;
034    this.connected = connected;
035    this.conn = conn;
036  }
037
038  private final NetworkTableInstance m_inst;
039
040  public NetworkTableInstance getInstance() {
041    return m_inst;
042  }
043}
